clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Oral Malodor and Other Outcomes Following The Use of Two-Step Toothpaste Oral Hygiene

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess changes in oral malodor and other factors in response to using a two-step toothpaste oral hygiene relative to a sensitivity whitening toothpaste.

primary_outcome.description: Breath measured using a hedonic malodor evaluation
